column5: This Saturday we thought that we would head ot from Big Bay Point.  We have never fished from here before, always Alcona or Innisfil Beach Area.  Two questions:  A) anybody planning on heading out from there, it would be nice to meet some of the faces that we exchange with here on the board?  any suggestions, we were thinking of just walking out, it looks like the drop off is pretty close to shore here?  Thanks,  Michael
You have to get very early due to limited Parking space. If you go there, watch where these huts are. Usualy 90 ~110 FOW are good.  Be careful. Weather seems not good.
